headline: Show HN: RateYourRecruiter.dev
description:
Tech recruiting and interviewing sucks. So I created https://www.rateyourrecruiter.dev/ to hold recruiters to account.

The elevator pitch reads: Interviewing for a role in a highly sought after tech company is broken. Recruiters have incentive to get as many people in for interviews, with little to none (or incorrect) information. Questions often have little to do with on-the-job responsibilities, and are rarely communicated to recruiting and back to the candidate.

By having a more transparent process is not only more equitable, but will lead to greater success for candidates and recruiters. RateYourRecruiter.dev aims at demystifying the recruiting and tech interview process.
description_zh-Hans:
技术人员的招聘和面试很糟糕。因此，我创建了https://www.rateyourrecruiter.dev/，让招聘人员负责。

电梯口的内容是："我想知道。在一家受人追捧的科技公司中，面试工作已经崩溃。招聘人员有动力让尽可能多的人参加面试，但几乎没有（或不正确）的信息。问题往往与工作职责无关，而且很少与招聘人员沟通并反馈给候选人。

通过一个更透明的过程，不仅更公平，而且将为候选人和招聘人员带来更大的成功。RateYourRecruiter.dev旨在揭开招聘和技术面试过程的神秘面纱。
